body.name: Electric Standing Desk 63 Inch, Ergonomic Height Adjustable Table with T-Shaped Metal Bracket Modern Computer Workstations for Home Office, White, 63 x 24 Inches
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 3 hrs 11 mins
features: 【Health Office Style】Prolonged sitting during long office hours can take a toll on our bodies, resulting in back and neck discomfort. Enter our standing desk, designed to introduce a healthier way of working. It enables you to seamlessly switch between sitting and standing, offering relief from leg numbness and the fatigue associated with extended periods of sitting. This increased flexibility will enhance your concentration and productivity.

【Memory Electric Lift】Differing from regular office desks, this standing desk provides effortless height control through user-friendly buttons. It accommodates individuals of varying heights in diverse settings. The inclusion of sit/stand adjustments to your preferred comfortable height. The motor system includes safety features like child lock, anti-collision, and overheat protection.

【Spacious Wood Desktop】We present a generously sized desktop, measuring up to 63 x 23.6 inches, crafted from top-tier solid wood with rounded desk corners and integrated wire management. The wood-patterned surface exudes style and aesthetic appeal. The expansive tabletop offers ample space to accommodate your computer, laptop, work documents, printer, and other office essentials. Please note that the desk consists of two separate sections, not a single piece.

【Durable Quiet Motor】The motor is made of excellent material, undergoes rigorous testing with over ten inspection processes before being assembled into the desk. With minimal noise (below 50 dB), it enables you to adjust the desk's height swiftly, at a speed of 1 inch per second, ranging from 28.7 to 48.1 inches. This standing desk employs a cutting-edge motor with a prolonged service life, capable of enduring over 10,000 cycles of use, ensuring two years of daily reliability.

【Sturdy Desk Structure】Despite being constructed of steel material, the desk legs feature a lightweight and sturdy box-frame structure. The addition of adjustable feet at the bottom ensures perfect balance on any surface. The broad T-shaped foot design guarantees outstanding stability, even when the desk is set at its highest position.
body.description: Shahoo Height Adjustable Electric Standing Table Feature: Height adjustable High weight capacity Approximately silent Specification: Color: White Material: Metal, Wood, ETC. Package Dimensions: 34.65"(L) x 33.27"(W) x 5.12"(H) Package includes: A standing desk A tool kit A manual of installation and usage Notice: There may be some differences between photos and items in term of color because the influence of lighting during the shooting or the settings of the computers’ display screen.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 72 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: oh man this thing has to be the best bang for my bucks that i ever made, this desk is amazing, is sturdy, came with peripherical, the motor work good the rise the height, it came in great condition, don't expect a top quality on this, but is a decent one for the price, hold and rise really good my pc and hold 2 monitors with arms without problem, plenty space and the surface does feel good quality.Took about 4 hour to assemble, instruction are easy to understand, what it make it hard was the lack of pieces identified, you need to separate all the screws by sizes and your good to go, and i mean all, even the ones that come in small bag with other pieces because they are not identified, second bad thing about assembly is the a lot of screws goes directly in the wood under the desk, not easy to disassembly to move it around so try to put it on a solid place where you don't need to move it never

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It takes a bit to set it up, but if you follow the directions carefully, you’ll be good to go! It’s very quiet when it goes up & down. It also has preset heights for both sitting and standing, which is nice as a one button easy option. Very sturdy as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble & plenty of room for my work station . It is quiet when adjusting.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Plenty of space for my monitors. Quiet settings. Max height is more than enough.Quality of the table and frame is great. Only a few screw types to assemble and pre drill holes for easy assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well enough but max height exhibits quite a bit of wobble.
reviews.reviewText: Just received this today, assembly was very straightforward and quick. Quality of the materials seems pretty decent especially at the $100 price point that I paid. One minor complaint that I have is that it doesn't go quite low enough for what I would have liked but it's about the same as my previous desk, and that's on me for not doing thorough enough research. Not a deal breaker.The biggest inherent flaw that sticks out to me is the amount of front-to-back wobble that the desk exhibits when in standing position. It's distracting to me while I work which is unfortunate but luckily I don't stand most days for more than a couple hours so hopefully it isn't too much for me to deal with. Not a strong enough reason to deal with returning it at this point, we'll see how well I am able to tolerate it moving forward.Otherwise, some praise:* Motor is quiet and smooth* Memory function is really nice to have so I don't need to micro adjust settings every time I want to stand* As mentioned, assembly with my existing desk top was a breeze.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent frame and price
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Works on a 70" x 30" beefy Steelcase table top. Smooth and quiet motors. Totally worth the price I paid. I love it. The provided phillips screws weren't the best for drilling, but I made it work. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great desk. Huge and super easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Dont get the white
reviews.reviewText: Putting it together would be 100% easier with labeled parts or a quick tutorial video. The hardest part was figuring out the instructions.I got the white top and it is already scraped and the paint looks weird, I wish I would have gotten the wood top. The white is a thin, wobbly .5 piece of particle board or something. Would send it back but don't want to disassemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Standing
reviews.reviewText: I could say nothing wrong about this desk so far. I love the build quality of it and it's perfect for when I need to stand. Price is fantastic bonus!
